short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create strong and customizable passwords. Ajust length & characters. Quick copy. Protect your accounts. Get the Chrome extension now

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🛠 This is the ultimate password generator extension for Google Chrome, the perfect tool to secure your online accounts and personal information.

🔐 With our extension, you can easily generate strong and secure passwords that meet your specific needs. Our extension includes several settings that allow you to customize your password, such as managing the length of the password and selecting the types of characters to include.

🔐 Our extension allows you to create unique and highly secure passwords of up to 60 characters. You can choose to include upper and lower case letters, numbers and symbols, and our extension will automatically and randomly generate a password that matches your criteria.

🛡️ Our algorithm ensures that your passwords are unique, highly secure and almost impossible to guess or crack.


📌Changelog:

Version 1.1.0 (2023-03-16):
- Added functionality to save input settings for an improved user experience.
- Checkbox and password length settings are now retained when browsing and closing the extension.
- Minor bug fixes and stability improvements.

Version 1.0.0 (2023-03-15):
- Initial launch of the Secure Password Generator extension.
- Generates unique and highly secure passwords based on user criteria.
- Options to include upper and lower case letters, numbers and symbols.
